00044 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MGS

00046 #include <lustre_fid.h>
00047 #include "mgs_internal.h"
00048 
00062 int mgs_export_stats_init(struct obd_device *obd, struct obd_export *exp,
00063                           void *localdata)
00064 {
00065         lnet_nid_t *client_nid = localdata;
00066         struct nid_stat *stats;
00067         int rc;
00068         ENTRY;
00069 
00070         rc = lprocfs_exp_setup(exp, client_nid);
00071         if (rc != 0)
00072                 /* Mask error for already created /proc entries */
00073                 RETURN(rc == -EALREADY ? 0 : rc);
00074 
00075         stats = exp->exp_nid_stats;
00076         stats->nid_stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(NUM_OBD_STATS + LPROC_MGS_LAST,
00077                                                 LPROCFS_STATS_FLAG_NOPERCPU);
00078         if (stats->nid_stats == NULL)
00079                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00080 
00081         lprocfs_init_ops_stats(LPROC_MGS_LAST, stats->nid_stats);
00082 
00083         mgs_stats_counter_init(stats->nid_stats);
00084 
00085         rc = lprocfs_register_stats(stats->nid_proc, "stats", stats->nid_stats);
00086         if (rc != 0) {
00087                 lprocfs_free_stats(&stats->nid_stats);
00088                 GOTO(out, rc);
00089         }
00090 
00091         rc = lprocfs_nid_ldlm_stats_init(stats);
00092         if (rc != 0)
00093                 GOTO(out, rc);
00094 
00095 out:
00096         RETURN(rc);
00097 }

00104 int mgs_client_add(struct obd_device *obd, struct obd_export *exp,
00105                           void *localdata)
00106 {
00107         return 0;
00108 }

00110 /* Remove client export data from the MGS */
00111 int mgs_client_free(struct obd_export *exp)
00112 {
00113         return 0;
00114 }

00116 int mgs_fs_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs)
00117 {
00118         struct lu_fid            fid;
00119         struct dt_object        *o;
00120         struct lu_fid            rfid;
00121         struct dt_object        *root;
00122         struct dt_object        *nm_config_file_obj;
00123         struct nm_config_file   *nm_config_file;
00124         int                      rc;
00125 
00126         ENTRY;
00127 
00128         OBD_SET_CTXT_MAGIC(&mgs->mgs_obd->obd_lvfs_ctxt);
00129         mgs->mgs_obd->obd_lvfs_ctxt.dt = mgs->mgs_bottom;
00130 
00131         /* XXX: fix when support for N:1 layering is implemented */
00132         LASSERT(mgs->mgs_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site);
00133         mgs->mgs_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site->ls_top_dev =
00134                 &mgs->mgs_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev;
00135 
00136         /* Setup the configs dir */
00137         fid.f_seq = FID_SEQ_LOCAL_NAME;
00138         fid.f_oid = 1;
00139         fid.f_ver = 0;
00140         rc = local_oid_storage_init(env, mgs->mgs_bottom, &fid, &mgs->mgs_los);
00141         if (rc)
00142                 GOTO(out, rc);
00143 
00144         rc = dt_root_get(env, mgs->mgs_bottom, &rfid);
00145         if (rc)
00146                 GOTO(out_los, rc);
00147 
00148         root = dt_locate_at(env, mgs->mgs_bottom, &rfid,
00149                             &mgs->mgs_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev, NULL);
00150         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(root)))
00151                 GOTO(out_los, rc = PTR_ERR(root));
00152 
00153         o = local_file_find_or_create(env, mgs->mgs_los, root,
00154                                       MOUNT_CONFIGS_DIR,
00155                                       S_IFDIR | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR | S_IXUGO);
00156         if (IS_ERR(o))
00157                 GOTO(out_root, rc = PTR_ERR(o));
00158 
00159         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, o)) {
00160                 lu_object_put(env, &o->do_lu);
00161                 GOTO(out_root, rc = -ENOTDIR);
00162         }
00163 
00164         mgs->mgs_configs_dir = o;
00165 
00166         nm_config_file_obj = local_index_find_or_create(env, mgs->mgs_los,
00167                                                         mgs->mgs_configs_dir,
00168                                                         LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME,
00169                                                         S_IFREG | S_IRUGO |
00170                                                                   S_IWUSR,
00171                                                         &dt_nodemap_features);
00172         if (IS_ERR(nm_config_file_obj))
00173                 GOTO(out_configs, rc = PTR_ERR(nm_config_file_obj));
00174 
00175         if (nm_config_file_obj->do_index_ops == NULL) {
00176                 rc = nm_config_file_obj->do_ops->do_index_try(env,
00177                                                         nm_config_file_obj,
00178                                                         &dt_nodemap_features);
00179                 if (rc < 0) {
00180                         lu_object_put(env, &nm_config_file_obj->do_lu);
00181                         GOTO(out_configs, rc);
00182                 }
00183         }
00184         nm_config_file = nm_config_file_register(env, nm_config_file_obj);
00185         if (IS_ERR(nm_config_file)) {
00186                 lu_object_put(env, &nm_config_file_obj->do_lu);
00187                 CERROR("%s: error loading nodemap config file, file must be "
00188                        "removed via ldiskfs: rc = %ld\n",
00189                        mgs->mgs_obd->obd_name, PTR_ERR(nm_config_file));
00190                 GOTO(out_configs, rc = PTR_ERR(nm_config_file));
00191         }
00192         mgs->mgs_obd->u.obt.obt_nodemap_config_file = nm_config_file;
00193 
00194         /* create directory to store nid table versions */
00195         o = local_file_find_or_create(env, mgs->mgs_los, root, MGS_NIDTBL_DIR,
00196                                       S_IFDIR | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR | S_IXUGO);
00197         if (IS_ERR(o))
00198                 GOTO(out_nm, rc = PTR_ERR(o));
00199 
00200         mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir = o;
00201 
00202 out_nm:
00203         if (rc < 0) {
00204                 nm_config_file_deregister(env, nm_config_file);
00205                 mgs->mgs_obd->u.obt.obt_nodemap_config_file = NULL;
00206         }
00207 out_configs:
00208         if (rc < 0) {
00209                 lu_object_put(env, &mgs->mgs_configs_dir->do_lu);
00210                 mgs->mgs_configs_dir = NULL;
00211         }
00212 out_root:
00213         lu_object_put(env, &root->do_lu);
00214 out_los:
00215         if (rc) {
00216                 local_oid_storage_fini(env, mgs->mgs_los);
00217                 mgs->mgs_los = NULL;
00218         }
00219 out:
00220         mgs->mgs_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site->ls_top_dev = NULL;
00221 
00222         return rc;
00223 }
00224 
00225 int mgs_fs_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs)
00226 {
00227         if (mgs->mgs_configs_dir) {
00228                 lu_object_put(env, &mgs->mgs_configs_dir->do_lu);
00229                 mgs->mgs_configs_dir = NULL;
00230         }
00231         if (mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir) {
00232                 lu_object_put(env, &mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir->do_lu);
00233                 mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir = NULL;
00234         }
00235         if (mgs->mgs_obd->u.obt.obt_nodemap_config_file != NULL) {
00236                 nm_config_file_deregister(env,
00237                                 mgs->mgs_obd->u.obt.obt_nodemap_config_file);
00238                 mgs->mgs_obd->u.obt.obt_nodemap_config_file = NULL;
00239         }
00240 
00241         if (mgs->mgs_los) {
00242                 local_oid_storage_fini(env, mgs->mgs_los);
00243                 mgs->mgs_los = NULL;
00244         }
00245 
00246         return 0;
00247 }
